resources.string: Choose a device to be managed by %1$s
%1$s is requesting permission on behalf of your %2$s to stream apps between your devices
%1$s is requesting permission on behalf of your %2$s to display and stream apps between your devices
%1$s is requesting permission on behalf of your %2$s to access your phone’s photos, media, and notifications
%1$s is requesting permission on behalf of your %2$s to stream apps and other system features to nearby devices
Read and write phone call log
Access a list of available devices and control which one streams or casts audio or video from other apps
Stream apps and other system features from your phone
Find, connect to, and determine the relative position of nearby devices
Read all notifications, including information like contacts, messages, and photos

"• Read all notifications, including info like contacts, messages, and photos
• Send notifications

You can manage this app's ability to read and send notifications anytime in Settings > Notifications."
Give apps on %1$s the same permissions as on %2$s?

This may include Microphone, Camera, and Location access, and other sensitive permissions on %1$s.

You can change these permissions any time in your Settings on %1$s.

%1$s will have access to anything that’s visible or played on the phone, including audio, photos, passwords, and messages.

%1$s will be able to stream apps until you remove access to this permission.
This app will be able to sync info, like the name of someone calling, between your phone and the chosen device
This app will be allowed to access these permissions on your %1$s

%1$s will have access to anything that’s visible or played on your phone, including audio, photos, payment info, passwords, and messages.

%1$s will be able to stream apps and system features until you remove access to this permission.
This app will be allowed to sync info, like the name of someone calling, and access these permissions on your %1$s
Allow %1$s to access this information from your phone
Allow %1$s to stream your phone’s apps?
Allow %1$s to access this information from your phone
Allow %1$s to stream your phone’s apps and system features?
